itineraries.name: Classic Golden Triangle - 7 Days
user_tips: Book Alhambra tickets 2-3 months in advance
Stay in historic centers for authentic experience
Use AVE high-speed train between major cities

itineraries.name: Complete Andalusia Experience - 10 Days
user_tips: Rent car after visiting major cities
White villages best in spring for wildflowers
Book paradores early for unique stays

itineraries.name: Backpacker's Andalusia - 10 Days Budget
user_tips: Tapas bars are cheapest dinner option

activities: Day trip to Cádiz by train

itineraries.name: Family Andalusia Adventure - 8 Days
user_tips: Book hotels with pools for afternoon breaks
Audio guides for kids at Alhambra are excellent
Plaza de España boat rides are a hit with children
Pack snacks - Spanish meal times are late

itineraries.name: Jewish Heritage Trail - 7 Days
user_tips: Visit Casa de Sefarad in Córdoba
Kosher meal options limited - plan ahead
Combine with Portugal for extended Sephardic journey

itineraries.name: Western Andalusia - Sherry, Nature & Flamenco
user_tips: Stay overnight in Jerez for evening flamenco
Cádiz has better beaches than Costa del Sol
Drive white villages route in good weather

itineraries.name: Adventure Andalusia - Nature & Hiking
user_tips: Book Caminito del Rey permits 3 months ahead
Spring best for wildflowers and water flow

itineraries.name: Culinary Andalusia Discovery
user_tips: Learn about olive oil varieties in Jaén
Try salmorejo in Córdoba where it originated

itineraries.name: Luxury Andalusia Experience
user_tips: Private Alhambra sunrise access worth the premium
Stay at Hotel Alfonso XIII in Seville
Helicopter scenic flight over Ronda unforgettable

itineraries.name: Reddit's Perfect Week in Andalusia
user_tips: 2 nights each major city is perfect
Skip Madrid - fly directly to Seville
Book AVE trains early for discounts
Stay near Santa Justa station in Seville

itineraries.name: למטייל Classic Andalusia - 8 Days
user_tips: Many Israeli tour companies offer this route
Book through Israeli agencies for Hebrew guides
Kosher options in major cities only

itineraries.name: Costa del Sol Beach & Culture - 7 Days
user_tips: Combine beach mornings with cultural afternoons

itineraries.name: Photographer's Andalusia - 10 Days
user_tips: Wake up early for best light
Blue hour at Plaza de España magical

itineraries.name: Romantic Andalusia for Couples - 6 Days
user_tips: Sunset at Mirador San Nicolás unforgettable

itineraries.name: Senior Travelers Andalusia - 9 Days
user_tips: Use wheelchairs at Alhambra if needed

itineraries.name: Wine & Olive Oil Trail - 8 Days
user_tips: Jaén has world's best olive oil
Designate driver or use private transport

itineraries.name: Eastern Andalusia Explorer - 7 Days
user_tips: Cabo de Gata best kept secret

itineraries.name: Moorish Architecture Deep Dive - 8 Days
user_tips: Allow extra time at each monument

itineraries.name: Spring Wildflower Trails - 10 Days
user_tips: Late March to April peak bloom

itineraries.name: Andalusia Christmas Markets - 6 Days
user_tips: Book early for New Year's Eve

itineraries.name: LGBTQ+ Friendly Andalusia - 7 Days
user_tips: Chueca in Madrid is gay district

mixed_transport.recommended: Train for cities, car for villages and nature
mixed_transport.strategy: Rent car only for specific legs (e.g., Ronda-White Villages-Seville)

accommodation_strategies.booking_timing: 3-6 months for peak season, 1 month for off-season

money_saving_tips: Visit monuments during free hours (early morning)
Eat menu del día for lunch (12-15 EUR)
Free walking tours in major cities

dining: Bar bill paid at end, not per round
general: Greet with dos besos (two kisses) among friends

safety: Watch for pickpockets in tourist areas

best_times: Golden hour: 1 hour after sunrise, 1 hour before sunset
Blue hour: 30 mins before sunrise, 30 mins after sunset
iconic_shots: Plaza de España at blue hour

common_mistakes: Not booking Alhambra tickets in advance
Not renting car for white villages
Expecting everything to be open Sunday

april: Feria de Abril Seville (2 weeks after Easter)

wifi_connectivity.availability: Excellent in cities, good in towns, limited in rural areas
wifi_connectivity.sim_cards: Vodafone, Orange, Movistar available at airports

difficulty_levels.moderate: Active days, some hiking, full schedule
difficulty_levels.challenging: Extensive hiking, physical activities, demanding pace
